title: Stranger Than Fiction: Robert Sawyer
description: Tim Wu talks with Robert Sawyer, a science fiction writer who is the author of The Terminal Experiment and The Neanderthal Parallax. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
itunes:author: Slate
itunes:subtitle: Tim Wu talks with Robert Sawyer, a science fiction writer who is the author of The Terminal Experiment and The Neanderthal Parallax. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
